snippet: The Lede speaks to one of the young Egyptian activists working to draw attention to the plight of thousands of civilians jailed by the country's military since last year's revolution.
abstract: The Lede speaks to one of the young Egyptian activists working to draw attention to the plight of thousands of civilians jailed by the country's military since last year's revolution.

headline.main: Egyptian Activists Demand an End to Military Trials for Civilians
